EmailTemplate.subject: Update on your Motorpass application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for your interest in joining WEX Australia Pty Ltd national network of merchants.
More and more Australian businesses are choosing Motorpass, Australia's premier fleet cards, to manage their vehicle related expenses. As a merchant of our network you will enjoy access to almost 145,000 cardholders nationally who use Motorpass for fuel, repairs, accommodation, car parking, vehicle rental and taxis.
Once your application has been finalised, you will receive a start-up kit containing stationery, operating procedures, a merchant identification card, and Motorpass decals. Make sure that you display the Motorpass symbol prominently, as our research indicates that cardholders' vehicle servicing decisions are heavily influenced by site badging.
Your new merchant number will be activated once we receive your completed application for this merchant facility. In addition please ensure a copy of your current driver's licence and a bank deposit slip are photocopied and enclosed. If you are already trading in your business, do not use the Merchant Number of the previous owner.
Please note section M of the form which requires you to nominate a payment plan. This choice determines how quickly you will be paid by us and commission rate applicable.

For further information or assistance completing your application, please contact our Merchant Support Team on 1300 130 113.
We look forward to receiving your application and welcoming you to our network.
Yours sincerely,
Tracey Vines
Merchant Support Manager
#WEX Australia offers no guarantee for payment of transactions received prior to the receipt of your completed merchant application.
We see corporate payments differently.
